description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Take on the all powerful Advanced Weapons Research Corporation in this twisted, dark story rpg/platformer/adventure mixture. Steal all the Froot, hack through security systems, take out the guards,  find all the secrets and most important of all, figure out what is going on! Featuring around four to five hours of gameplay the final ending will blow you away... If you survive...
